abstract: Comedy troupe Upright Citizens Brigade opens its second theater in Manhattan, known as UCB East, in the East Village.
snippet: The Upright Citizens Brigade opens an East Village outpost, its third, following its branches on West 26th Street and in Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: The Upright Citizens Brigade opens an East Village outpost, its third, following its branches on West 26th Street and in Los Angeles.

headline.main: Comedy Troupe Delivers Its Second New York Baby
headline.print_headline: Comedy Troupe Delivers Its Second New York Baby
headline.seo: Upright Citizens Brigade Theater Opens in East Village
